extendedInfo.description: An Android front end to the fmylife.com website. Allows you to browse, vote, submit, comment, and share FMLs. (long-press to share)To comment, submit, or vote, you will need to sign up for a free fmylife.com account.Repeated comments are a bug on their end; they're working on it! Please be patient.

reviews.title: no longer working
reviews.comment: Ive had this app for a long time and had no issues with it and loved it. the past few days however it wont load all i get is a black screen...fix it please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Wow! Umm :-\\ yea so i just read them when im bored! some are funny and some arent!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app works for the first page you look at first page you search for, but if you try to go to the next page it\'s just blackness.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: One of the best apps ever! Its works awesone on the new motorola CLIQ from T-mobile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: ROFL keeps me laughing all day at work...one downfall...changing from landscape to portrait reset the page.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pretty awesome but would be more amazing if you could actually commment on some of the fml\'s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t crash as much as official app, but user interface is nowhere near as good. I would rather deal with force closes. Uninstalled. Evo.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I keep having problems with the app to where the screen is blank upon first entering or it will go blank qfter hitting next page
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this. But I need more space on my phone. :(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Had to reinstall. Not the apps fault. Been too lazy to upgrade from cyanogen 4.0.4. Great minimalistic FML app. Better than going to the website.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best fml app in market at the moment.the interface is simple yet very effective. Btw isn\'t each letter in the logo a picture? Not just plain txt.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app...it would be better if it updated more frequently but i still love it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t...stop...reading
reviews.comment: Its brilliant!  Every wqking minute im checking for someone\'s life fails!  Garenteed to make you laugh  no matter what your humor is
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: When I\'m like 10 pages in and I click next page sometimes it goes back to page one and I have to start all over again. Pls fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Just wish you could post your own
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It was really good....But it doesn\'t load the \"first page\" how am I supposed to get the most recent fmls?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works pretty good, wish I could switch it to random though...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Gave me a hiccup or 2 when trying to setup my login but other than that, I don\'t see any FmL app getting better than this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app, friendly ui, would get 5 stars if there was a widget
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great app and they r always fun to read and very funny
reviews.author: A Google User
